subject: Athletics and Sports
Basketball
lead_paragraph: DALLAS MAVERICKS Coach Avery Johnson gave the Mavericks discipline and an identity, instilling a defensive mind-set to balance a versatile attack. The Mavericks will use their finals failure to fuel them. Dirk Nowitzki will again vie for M.V.P. honors, Jason Terry has a handle on the point guard position, and the Mavs still have depth. But did they blow their best chance to win it all?.
